verses.verse: Give ear <S%H238><s%> <S%H8685><s%>, O ye heavens <S%H8064><s%>, and I will speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%>; and hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, O earth <S%H776><s%>, the words <S%H561><s%> of my mouth <S%H6310><s%>.

My doctrine <S%H3948><s%> shall drop <S%H6201><s%> <S%H8799><s%> as the rain <S%H4306><s%>, my speech <S%H565><s%> shall distil <S%H5140><s%> <S%H8799><s%> as the dew <S%H2919><s%>, as the small rain <S%H8164><s%> upon the tender herb <S%H1877><s%>, and as the showers <S%H7241><s%> upon the grass <S%H6212><s%>:
Because I will publish <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>: ascribe <S%H3051><s%> <S%H8798><s%> ye greatness <S%H1433><s%> unto our 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>.

He is the Rock <S%H6697><s%>, his work <S%H6467><s%> is perfect <S%H8549><s%>: for all his ways <S%H1870><s%> are judgment <S%H4941><s%>: a 'Elohim <S%H410><s%> of truth <S%H530><s%> and without iniquity <S%H5766><s%>, just <S%H6662><s%> and right <S%H3477><s%> is he.

They have corrupted <S%H7843><s%> <S%H8765><s%> themselves, their spot <S%H3971><s%> is not the spot of his children <S%H1121><s%>: they are a perverse <S%H6141><s%> and crooked <S%H6618><s%> generation <S%H1755><s%>.

Do ye thus requite <S%H1580><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>, O foolish <S%H5036><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> and unwise <S%H2450><s%>? is not he thy father <S%H1><s%> that hath bought <S%H7069><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thee? hath he not made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thee, and established <S%H3559><s%> <S%H8787><s%> thee?

Remember <S%H2142><s%> <S%H8798><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of old <S%H5769><s%>, consider <S%H995><s%> <S%H8798><s%> the years <S%H8141><s%> of many <S%H1755><s%> generations <S%H1755><s%>: ask <S%H7592><s%> <S%H8798><s%> thy father <S%H1><s%>, and he will shew <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8686><s%> thee; thy elders <S%H2205><s%>, and they will tell <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thee.

When Ha `Elyon <S%H5945><s%> divided <S%H5157><s%> to the nations <S%H1471><s%> their inheritance <S%H5157><s%> <S%H8687><s%>, when he separated <S%H6504><s%> <S%H8687><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Adam <S%H120><s%>, he set <S%H5324><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the bounds <S%H1367><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.
For the YY'S <S%H3068><s%> portion <S%H2506><s%> is his people <S%H5971><s%>; Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%> is the lot <S%H2256><s%> of his inheritance <S%H5159><s%>.

He found <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him in a desert <S%H4057><s%> land <S%H776><s%>, and in the waste <S%H8414><s%> howling <S%H3214><s%> wilderness <S%H3452><s%>; he led him about <S%H5437><s%> <S%H8779><s%>, he instructed <S%H995><s%> <S%H8787><s%> him, he kept <S%H5341><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him as the apple <S%H380><s%> of his eye <S%H5869><s%>.

As an eagle <S%H5404><s%> stirreth up <S%H5782><s%> <S%H8686><s%> her nest <S%H7064><s%>, fluttereth <S%H7363><s%> <S%H8762><s%> over her young <S%H1469><s%>, spreadeth abroad <S%H6566><s%> <S%H8799><s%> her wings <S%H3671><s%>, taketh <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them, beareth <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them on her wings <S%H84><s%>:
So the YY <S%H3068><s%> alone <S%H910><s%> did lead <S%H5148><s%> <S%H8686><s%> him, and there was no strange <S%H5236><s%> god <S%H410><s%> with him.

He made him ride <S%H7392><s%> <S%H8686><s%> on the high places <S%H1116><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>, that he might eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the increase <S%H8570><s%> of the fields <S%H7704><s%>; and he made him to suck <S%H3243><s%> <S%H8686><s%> honey <S%H1706><s%> out of the rock <S%H5553><s%>, and oil <S%H8081><s%> out of the flinty <S%H2496><s%> rock <S%H6697><s%>;

Butter <S%H2529><s%> of kine <S%H1241><s%>, and milk <S%H2461><s%> of sheep <S%H6629><s%>, with fat <S%H2459><s%> of lambs <S%H3733><s%>, and rams <S%H352><s%> of the breed <S%H1121><s%> of Bashan <S%H1316><s%>, and goats <S%H6260><s%>, with the fat <S%H2459><s%> of kidneys <S%H3629><s%> of wheat <S%H2406><s%>; and thou didst drink <S%H8354><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the pure <S%H2561><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%> of the grape <S%H6025><s%>.

But Yeshurun <S%H3484><s%> waxed fat <S%H8080><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and kicked <S%H1163><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: thou art waxen fat <S%H8080><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, thou art grown thick <S%H5666><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, thou art covered <S%H3780><s%> <S%H8804><s%> with fatness; then he forsook <S%H5203><s%> <S%H8799><s%> 'Elohim <S%H433><s%> which made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> him, and lightly esteemed <S%H5034><s%> <S%H8762><s%> the Rock <S%H6697><s%> of his salvation <S%H3444><s%>.
They provoked him to jealousy <S%H7065><s%> <S%H8686><s%> with strange <S%H2114><s%> <S%H8801><s%> 'elohim, with abominations <S%H8441><s%> provoked they him to anger <S%H3707><s%> <S%H8686><s%>.

They sacrificed <S%H2076><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto devils <S%H7700><s%>, not to 'Elohim <S%H433><s%>; to 'elohim <S%H430><s%> whom they knew <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not, to new <S%H2319><s%> 'elohim that came <S%H935><s%> newly <S%H7138><s%> up <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, whom your fathers <S%H1><s%> feared <S%H8175><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not.

Of the Rock <S%H6697><s%> that begat <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thee thou art unmindful <S%H7876><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and hast forgotten <S%H7911><s%> <S%H8799><s%> 'Elohim <S%H410><s%> that formed <S%H2342><s%> <S%H8789><s%> thee.

And when the YY <S%H3068><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it, he abhorred <S%H5006><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them, because of the provoking <S%H3708><s%> of his sons <S%H1121><s%>, and of his daughters <S%H1323><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, I will hide <S%H5641><s%> <S%H8686><s%> my face <S%H6440><s%> from them, I will see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> what their end <S%H319><s%> shall be: for they are a very froward <S%H8419><s%> generation <S%H1755><s%>, children <S%H1121><s%> in whom is no faith <S%H529><s%>.

They have moved me to jealousy <S%H7065><s%> <S%H8765><s%> with that which is not <S%H3808><s%> 'Elohim <S%H410><s%>; they have provoked me to anger <S%H3707><s%> <S%H8765><s%> with their vanities <S%H1892><s%>: and I will move them to jealousy <S%H7065><s%> <S%H8686><s%> with those which are not a people <S%H5971><s%>; I will provoke them to anger <S%H3707><s%> <S%H8686><s%> with a foolish <S%H5036><s%> nation <S%H1471><s%>.

For a fire <S%H784><s%> is kindled <S%H6919><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in mine anger <S%H639><s%>, and shall burn <S%H3344><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the lowest <S%H8482><s%> SH'ol <S%H7585><s%>, and shall consume <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> with her increase <S%H2981><s%>, and set on fire <S%H3857><s%> <S%H8762><s%> the foundations <S%H4144><s%> of the mountains <S%H2022><s%>.
I will heap <S%H5595><s%> <S%H8686><s%> mischiefs <S%H7451><s%> upon them; I will spend <S%H3615><s%> <S%H8762><s%> mine arrows <S%H2671><s%> upon them.

They shall be burnt <S%H4198><s%> with hunger <S%H7458><s%>, and devoured <S%H3898><s%> <S%H8803><s%> with burning heat <S%H7565><s%>, and with bitter <S%H4815><s%> destruction <S%H6986><s%>: I will also send <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8762><s%> the teeth <S%H8127><s%> of beasts <S%H929><s%> upon them, with the poison <S%H2534><s%> of serpents <S%H2119><s%> <S%H8801><s%> of the dust <S%H6083><s%>.

The sword <S%H2719><s%> without <S%H2351><s%>, and terror <S%H367><s%> within <S%H2315><s%>, shall destroy <S%H7921><s%> <S%H8762><s%> both the young man <S%H970><s%> and the virgin <S%H1330><s%>, the suckling <S%H3243><s%> <S%H8802><s%> also with the man <S%H376><s%> of gray hairs <S%H7872><s%>.

I said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, I would scatter them into corners <S%H6284><s%> <S%H8686><s%>, I would make the remembrance <S%H2143><s%> of them to cease <S%H7673><s%> <S%H8686><s%> from among men <S%H582><s%>:

Were it not <S%H3884><s%> that I feared <S%H1481><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the wrath <S%H3708><s%> of the enemy <S%H341><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, lest their adversaries <S%H6862><s%> should behave themselves strangely <S%H5234><s%> <S%H8762><s%>, and lest they should say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Our hand <S%H3027><s%> is high <S%H7311><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and the YY <S%H3068><s%> hath not done <S%H6466><s%> <S%H8804><s%> all this.
For they are a nation <S%H1471><s%> void <S%H6><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of counsel <S%H6098><s%>, neither is there any understanding <S%H8394><s%> in them.

O that <S%H3863><s%> they were wise <S%H2449><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, that they understood <S%H7919><s%> <S%H8686><s%> this, that they would consider <S%H995><s%> <S%H8799><s%> their latter end <S%H319><s%> !

How should one <S%H259><s%> chase <S%H7291><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a thousand <S%H505><s%>, and two <S%H8147><s%> put ten <S%H7233><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> to flight <S%H5127><s%> <S%H8686><s%>, except <S%H3808><s%> their Rock <S%H6697><s%> had sold <S%H4376><s%> <S%H8804><s%> them <S%H3588><s%>, and the YY <S%H3068><s%> had shut them up <S%H5462><s%> <S%H8689><s%> ?
For their rock <S%H6697><s%> is not as our Rock <S%H6697><s%>, even our enemies <S%H341><s%> <S%H8802><s%> themselves being judges <S%H6414><s%>.

For their vine <S%H1612><s%> is of the vine <S%H1612><s%> of Sodom <S%H5467><s%>, and of the fields <S%H7709><s%> of Gomorrah <S%H6017><s%>: their grapes <S%H6025><s%> are grapes <S%H6025><s%> of gall <S%H7219><s%>, their clusters <S%H811><s%> are bitter <S%H4846><s%>:
Their wine <S%H3196><s%> is the poison <S%H2534><s%> of dragons <S%H8577><s%>, and the cruel <S%H393><s%> venom <S%H7219><s%> of asps <S%H6620><s%>.
Is not this laid up in store <S%H3647><s%> <S%H8803><s%> with me, and sealed up <S%H2856><s%> <S%H8803><s%> among my treasures <S%H214><s%> ?

To me belongeth vengeance <S%H5359><s%>, and recompence <S%H8005><s%>; their foot <S%H7272><s%> shall slide <S%H4131><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in due time <S%H6256><s%>: for the day <S%H3117><s%> of their calamity <S%H343><s%> is at hand <S%H7138><s%>, and the things that shall come <S%H6264><s%> upon them make haste <S%H2363><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.

For the YY <S%H3068><s%> shall judge <S%H1777><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his people <S%H5971><s%>, and repent <S%H5162><s%> <S%H8691><s%> himself for his servants <S%H5650><s%>, when he seeth <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> that their power <S%H3027><s%> is gone <S%H235><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and there is none <S%H657><s%> shut up <S%H6113><s%> <S%H8803><s%>, or left <S%H5800><s%> <S%H8803><s%>.
And he shall say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, Where are their 'elohim <S%H430><s%>, their rock <S%H6697><s%> in whom they trusted <S%H2620><s%> <S%H8804><s%>,

Which did eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the fat <S%H2459><s%> of their sacrifices <S%H2077><s%>, and drank <S%H8354><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the wine <S%H3196><s%> of their drink offerings <S%H5257><s%>? let them rise up <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and help <S%H5826><s%> <S%H8799><s%> you, and be your protection <S%H5643><s%>.

See <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8798><s%> now that I, even I, am he, and there is no god <S%H430><s%> with me: I kill <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8686><s%>, and I make alive <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8762><s%>; I wound <S%H4272><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and I heal <S%H7495><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: neither is there any that can deliver <S%H5337><s%> <S%H8688><s%> out of my hand <S%H3027><s%>.
For I lift up <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8799><s%> my hand <S%H3027><s%> to heaven <S%H8064><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, I live <S%H2416><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>.

If I whet <S%H8150><s%> <S%H8804><s%> my glittering <S%H1300><s%> sword <S%H2719><s%>, and mine hand <S%H3027><s%> take hold <S%H270><s%> <S%H8799><s%> on judgment <S%H4941><s%>; I will render <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8686><s%> vengeance <S%H5359><s%> to mine enemies <S%H6862><s%>, and will reward <S%H7999><s%> <S%H8762><s%> them that hate <S%H8130><s%> <S%H8764><s%> me.

I will make mine arrows <S%H2671><s%> drunk <S%H7937><s%> <S%H8686><s%> with blood <S%H1818><s%>, and my sword <S%H2719><s%> shall devour <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%>; and that with the blood <S%H1818><s%> of the slain <S%H2491><s%> and of the captives <S%H7633><s%>, from the beginning <S%H7218><s%> of revenges <S%H6546><s%> upon the enemy <S%H341><s%> <S%H8802><s%>.

Rejoice <S%H7442><s%> <S%H8685><s%>, O ye nations <S%H1471><s%>, with his people <S%H5971><s%>: for he will avenge <S%H5358><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> of his servants <S%H5650><s%>, and will render <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8686><s%> vengeance <S%H5359><s%> to his adversaries <S%H6862><s%>, and will be merciful <S%H3722><s%> <S%H8765><s%> unto his land <S%H127><s%>, and to his people <S%H5971><s%>.

And Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> all the words <S%H1697><s%> of this song <S%H7892><s%> in the ears <S%H241><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%>, he, and Hoshea <S%H1954><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun <S%H5126><s%>.
And Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> made an end <S%H3615><s%> <S%H8762><s%> of speaking <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8763><s%> all these words <S%H1697><s%> to all Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>:

And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto them, Set <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8798><s%> your hearts <S%H3824><s%> unto all the words <S%H1697><s%> which I testify <S%H5749><s%> <S%H8688><s%> among you this day <S%H3117><s%>, which ye shall command <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8762><s%> your children <S%H1121><s%> to observe <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8800><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, all the words <S%H1697><s%> of this Torah <S%H8451><s%>.

For it is not a vain <S%H7386><s%> thing <S%H1697><s%> for you; because it is your life <S%H2416><s%>: and through this thing <S%H1697><s%> ye shall prolong <S%H748><s%> <S%H8686><s%> your days <S%H3117><s%> in the land <S%H127><s%>, whither ye go over <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8802><s%> Yarden <S%H3383><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8800><s%> it.
And the YY <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> that selfsame <S%H6106><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

Get thee up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8798><s%> into this mountain <S%H2022><s%> Abarim <S%H5682><s%>, unto mount <S%H2022><s%> N'vo <S%H5015><s%>, which is in the land <S%H776><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%>, that is over against <S%H6440><s%> Yericho <S%H3405><s%>; and behold <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8798><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Kanahan <S%H3667><s%>, which I give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8802><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> for a possession <S%H272><s%>:

And die <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8798><s%> in the mount <S%H2022><s%> whither thou goest up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, and be gathered <S%H622><s%> <S%H8735><s%> unto thy people <S%H5971><s%>; as Aharon <S%H175><s%> thy brother <S%H251><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in mount <S%H2022><s%> Hor <S%H2023><s%>, and was gathered <S%H622><s%> <S%H8734><s%> unto his people <S%H5971><s%>:

Because ye trespassed <S%H4603><s%> <S%H8804><s%> against me among <S%H8432><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> at the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Meribah-Kadesh <S%H4808><s%> <S%H6946><s%>, in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Zin <S%H6790><s%>; because ye sanctified <S%H6942><s%> <S%H8765><s%> me not in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.

Yet thou shalt see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> before thee; but thou shalt not go <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thither unto the land <S%H776><s%> which I give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8802><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.
